name: Adam Designs
tagline: Designing Great Websites at low prices
body:
# Adam Designs

## I was an amateur coder who designed websites as a hobby when I realised that could make a business out of it and make money while I was having fun.

### Not long ago I decided to set up the company Adam Designs. Adam Designs is a company where you can have your site designed and hosted by an amateur coder like myself. It can take up to three weeks to code some projects and I start at just €5 an hour with the price going down to €2.50 an after 10 hours. I have looked at other sites and the cheapest I have seen that will __build__ a site is €409.44 for a whole project. The very most that I can and will charge is €100 for 30 hours plus.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
